title: Flight Simulator 2020- How to - Velocity One Flight - Using sip connect
description:
In this video we will look at how to install and use the SIP Connect software which allows you to use the information lights on the base unit of the VelocityOne Flight from Turtle Beach.

The software required to use this functionality can be downloaded via the link below:
https://www.turtlebeach.com/pages/velocity-one-flight-sip-connect
